Title: The History of Ancient Egypt
Creator: Dr. Sarah Johnson
Description: A comprehensive study of ancient Egyptian civilization, covering pharaohs, pyramids, and daily life in the Nile Valley.

Title: Islamic Art and Architecture
Creator: Ahmed Hassan
Description: An exploration of Islamic artistic traditions from the 7th century to the present day.

Title: Modern Arabic Literature
Creator: Fatima Al-Zahra
Description: A critical analysis of contemporary Arabic literature and its global influence.
